Subskills.name: Sharp Vengeance
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by counter.

Subskills.name: Vengeful Hit
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Insatiable Challenger
Subskills.description: Casting counter taunts all nearby monsters inflicting armor break.

Subskills.name: Double Edge
Subskills.description: Chance to throw additional lances when struck.

Subskills.name: Rupturing Lance
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Spell Reflection
Subskills.description: Counter also reflects non-physical projectiles and attacks dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Lusting Blood
Subskills.description: Chance to replenish a portion of your maximum life on hit.

Subskills.name: Versus the World
Subskills.description: Counter no longer throws lances at monsters but gives you a chance to block incoming damage reflecting it back to the attacker with intense power.

Subskills.name: Stunning Lance
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Cheap Counter
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Bursting Lances
Subskills.description: Chance to throw multiple piercing lances around you when struck.

Subskills.name: Volley Build-up
Subskills.description: During its duration counter stores all damage taken. When expiring throw javelins at nearby monsters unleashing the stored damage taken.

Subskills.name: Give No Quarter
Subskills.description: Counter no longer has a duration but instead frequently drains your life and mana. Counter can be activated and deactivated and no longer has a cooldown.
